author: Academics Team
description: A baseline risk index model that calculates a student's risk score based on several key academic and engagement factors.

components.name: Last Date of Attendance (LDA)
components.calculation: Risk is calculated based on the number of days out, scaled to a max of 28 points.

components.name: Contact Success Rate
components.calculation: Risk is calculated as (1 - (Times Contacted / Contact Attempts)) * 16.

components.name: Previous Grade
components.calculation: Risk is calculated as (1 - Prev. Grade %) * 11.
